attributes.action: force all ministers who deliberately avoid public debate and voting on the Iraq war to sport a gel infused blue mohawk for the duration of 1 week.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition has been designed so that the general public can identify those ministers who choose not to involve themselves in the democratic process that ought to accompany the decisions based around the war that is currently being held in, and around Iraq.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
